## SceneUIEventPayloads."SCENE\_UI.SET\_OFFSET" property

Emitted when the offset of a SceneUI is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[SceneUIEvent.SET_OFFSET]: {
        sceneUI: SceneUI;
        offset: Vector3Like;
    };
```
